page.title: 18COMMUNITY ACTIVITIES, BACK
page.content: {YOUTH ACTIVITIES} In Back,girls can join the Brownies or Guides.When boys are 13 they can join the Army Cadets.All the children in the area can attend a twice weekly youth club.There is an occaisional Friday night disco,held by the youth club to raise funds for equipment. Sunday School pupils are given an annual outing arranged by the church. {COMMUNITY ASSOCIATION Formed by local residents to promote the welfare of the district.They give the OAPs a Christmas Dinner and a Summer bus trip free of charge.They keep the local councillor in touch with local happenings and feelings.
